, , , FROM patient_medical pm LEFT JOIN patient_medical_check ck on ck.MEDICAL_CODE = pm.CODE LEFT JOIN patient_medical_dm dm on dm.MEDICAL_CODE = pm.CODE LEFT JOIN patient_medical_plan plan on plan.MEDICAL_CODE = pm.CODE
